# AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingOldest(_:)

**Case**

When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.

## Declaration

```swift
case bufferingOldest(Int)
```

## Discussion

This strategy enforces keeping the specified amount of oldest values.

## Buffering Policies

- **AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.unbounded**: Continue to add to the buffer, treating its capacity as infinite.
- **AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingNewest(_:)**: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
